head.citation-title: IST 2013 - 2013 IEEE International Conference on Imaging Systems and Techniques, ProceedingsIST 2013 - 2013 IEEE International Conference on Imaging Systems and Techniques, Proceedings
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 91 papers. The topics discussed include: image coding based on image segmentation and shape adaptive all phase biorthogonal transform; automated analysis of immunohistochemical images based on curve evolution approaches; three-dimensional temperature profiling of oxy-gas burner flames; color image watermarking via quaternion radial Tchebichef moments; visualization and modeling of cancer progression; reconstruction of dielectric and velocity profiles in pipelines through an electromagnetic inverse scattering technique; a compression system for colored images based on color characteristics; an adaptive total variation regularization method for electrical resistance tomography; statistical analysis on polarimetric study of lung cancer cells; color range determination and alpha matting for color images; and void fraction measurement of gas-liquid two-phase flow in mini-pipe based on image sequence.
